tasks.label: Deploy blueprint to Home Assistant
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-Content '${file}' -Raw | ssh ha 'sudo -n mkdir -p /config/blueprints/automation/dbwalker0min && sudo -n tee /config/blueprints/automation/dbwalker0min/battery_soc_color_lamp.yaml >/dev/null && if [ -r ~/.ha_token ]; then TOKEN=$(cat ~/.ha_token); curl -fsS -X POST -H \"Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN\" -H \"Content-Type: application/json\" http://127.0.0.1:8123/api/services/automation/reload >/dev/null || sudo -n ha core restart; else sudo -n ha core restart; fi'"
